actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to provide for the duty-free entry of certain machines, molds, and equipment, if products of Canada, used in molding and forming plastic materials.

summary.text: Revises the Tariff Schedules of the United States to provide for the duty-free entry of machines, molds, and equipment, if products of Canada, used in molding and forming plastic materials.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to provide for the duty-free entry of certain machines, molds, and equipment, if products of Canada, used in molding and forming plastic materials.
